publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3076# Michael Russell: Scottish Criminal Record Office-That the Parliament notes with concern the views of a range of international experts with regard to the performance of the Scottish Criminal Records Office (SCRO) in fingerprint identification and expects that the Scottish Executive will ensure that evidence in criminal cases given by SCRO experts is firmly and scientifically based and not merely a matter of opinion.
S1M-3076# Scottish Criminal Record Office (lodged on 7 May 2002) Stewart Stevenson*, Michael Matheson*, Alex Neil*

S1M-3076# Michael Russell: Scottish Criminal Record Office-That the Parliament notes with concern the views of a range of international experts with regard to the performance of the Scottish Criminal Records Office (SCRO) in fingerprint identification and expects that the Scottish Executive will ensure that evidence in criminal cases given by SCRO experts is firmly and scientifically based and not merely a matter of opinion. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson, Michael Matheson, Alex Neil, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3076# Scottish Criminal Record Office (lodged on 7 May 2002) Tricia Marwick*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3076# Scottish Criminal Record Office (lodged on 7 May 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-3076# Scottish Criminal Record Office (lodged on 7 May 2002) Dorothy-Grace Elder*
S1M-3076# Scottish Criminal Record Office (lodged on 7 May 2002) Linda Fabiani*
S1M-3076# Scottish Criminal Record Office (lodged on 7 May 2002) Fergus Ewing*
S1M-3076# Scottish Criminal Record Office (lodged on 7 May 2002) Brian Adam*
